user_query: I want to obtain financial statements and calculate a loan repayment schedule.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the income statement for ABC Corp for the fiscal year 2022.
Retrieve the balance sheet statement for ABC Corp for the fiscal year 2022.
Retrieve the cash flow statement for ABC Corp for the fiscal year 2022.
Calculate the loan repayment schedule for a loan amount of $500,000 with an annual interest rate of 5% and a term of 10 years.
